name: Crop Blast
description:
Crop Crack is a addictive funny puzzle game. In this game, you just need to click the adjacent candies of the same color to eliminate them all. Try it now and you will love this game very soon!

Blasting-Directional elimination, where to eliminate and revitalize the whole situation!

Color change-magic props, meticulous layout, maximize score!

Flip the grid props to make your situation clearer!

FEATURES

- This android app is totally FREE.
- Easy and fun to play, yet challenging to fully master.
- There are elaborate game sound effects and music which make you feel good.
- Mouth-watering new graphics, Crop Crack looks even tastier!

HOW TO PLAY

- Click the adjacent squares of the same color to eliminate them all.
- The higher the number of eliminations each time, the higher the score.
- Break the record and watch combos.
- 3 useful tools are there to help.
- Reach the target score or collect stars to enter the next level.
